title: Jack Dorsey criticizes Elon Musk’s leadership at Twitter: ‘It all went south’
description: Twitter's former CEO Jack Dorsey openly criticized Elon Musk's leadership of the company in a series of social media posts.

title: Big banks including JPMorgan Chase, Bank of America asked for final bids on First Republic
description: U.S. regulators have asked banks for their best and final offers for First Republic by Sunday afternoon.

title: Why GM is killing the Chevy Bolt — America's cheapest EV — amid record sales
description: To reach stated EV goals, GM needs the production capacity, profits and market positioning of its next-generation EVs. It doesn't believe it needs the Bolt.

title: The business case for green sports stadiums and arenas is growing
description: The push to make sports stadiums and arenas from the NBA to the NHL more sustainable is growing, and so is the business case for practices like zero-waste.

title: Major Wall Street firm sees a breakout in luxury stocks — and lists three reasons why ETFs are a great way to play it
description: Matt Bartolini, head of SPDR Americas research at State Street Global Advisors, finds valuations, earnings upgrades and price momentum are fueling the charge.

title: TikTokers are touting beef tallow treatments for clearer skin, but ‘you don’t know what you’re getting,' dermatologist warns
description: The latest TikTok skincare trend is using beef tallow to treat acne, but experts aren't on board.

title: As part of the ‘cocktail culture,' consumers are still splurging on dinner and drinks
description: When it comes to discretionary spending, splurging looks different in 2023: These days, adults would rather treat themselves to drinks or dinner out.

title: What’s next for SpaceX’s Starship after a dramatic first launch
description: Elon Musk's SpaceX launched its fully stacked Starship for the first time a little over a week ago.
